intro: Heterostemma gracile, commonly known as the slender heterostem, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many economically important plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are typically opposite and elliptic in shape, with a smooth texture. Heterostemma gracile is often found in humid, shaded environments such as forests and shrublands.
